content:
Netizen contribution
[Beware of malicious "visual poverty" rumors]
Recently, the Central Cyberspace Affairs Office once again took strong measures to deal with 373 illegal and irregular accounts.
It also reported some typical cases such as "Stock Market Essay", "Different Color Social Security Cards", "Rice on the Mountain", etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
On July 14, the media reported that a student from Dingzhou No. 2 Middle School in Hebei died after being punished by standing.
According to the contributor, the school's accommodation environment is very poor, and the weather in Hebei has been hot these days. The student was two minutes late in buying breakfast and arrived at the classroom. He was punished by the head teacher to stand outside. After standing for less than ten minutes, the student fell to the ground and died.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Player submission
Recently, "King of Glory" has caused a storm of insulting female players with poor gaming skills as "comfort women"
The cause of the incident was a female player who posted a video on Douyin, saying that she was killed several times by a single player because of her poor gaming skills, and was then insulted by two boys and called a comfort woman.
However, once the video was exposed, it became more popular, and more people began to imitate it, using "comfort women" to describe girls who were bad at gaming.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 13, Wang, a person involved in the subway line 3, posted a Weibo, questioning the Shanghai Public Security Bureau's excessive punishment on him.
He believed that he was acting in self-defense at the time, and said that the content of the notice was untrue, that he was "induced to confess" by the police during the interrogation, that the confession had no legal effect, and that the video in his mobile phone was deleted. ,
In the interview, he said that he shot the video out of the most simple patriotic feelings of the Chinese people.
At present, he said that he has reported to the 12388 website of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and applied for administrative reconsideration to the Shanghai Municipal Bureau of Justice on July 13.

On July 15, it was reported online that in the Hunan "Provincial Unit Asset System Technical Support Group", a person with the note "Provincial Office" sent obscene information in the group.
In response, Mr. Xu of the Hunan Branch said, "The group was invaded by a virus on the evening of July 14, which led to the appearance of obscene information in the group."
